children.title: accessTokenUri
children.description: The URI of the Token Endpoint as defined in RFC6749 Section 3.2. Not required forby implicit grant type.

children.title: authorizationGrants
children.description: A list of the Authorization grants supported by the API as defined in RFC6749 Sections 4.1, 4.2, 4.3 and 4.4, can be any of: authorization_code, password, client_credentials, implicit, or refresh_token.

children.title: scopes
children.description: A list of scopes supported by the security scheme as defined in RFC6749 Section 3.3

children.title: authorizationUri
children.description: The URI of the Authorization Endpoint as defined in RFC6749 Section 3.1. Required forby authorization_code and implicit grant types.
